another journal that restricts previous publication.</title> <values/> </field> <field name="does_not_contain" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>The manuscript does not contain copyrighted material.</title> <values/> </field> <field name="obtained_irb_or_iacuc" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>If the study involved human or animal subjects, the author obtained permission from the IRB or IACUC.</title> <values/> </field> <field name="have_read_guidelines" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>I have read the Oshkosh Scholar submission guidelines and style sheet and have made every effort to follow these guidelines.</title> <values/> </field> <field name="will_attend" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>I will attend a review meeting with the Oshkosh Scholar editorial staff and my faculty mentor.</title> <values/> </field> <field name="will_make_effort" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>I will make every reasonable effort to conform to the revision requests of the Oshkosh Scholar editorial staff, and failure to do so may result in failure to have my manuscript published.</title> <values/> </field> </schema> </model>
